attributes.action: ban the teaching of religion in school science lessons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is well known that 'theories' of evolution based on religious belief are being taught in school science lessons. We believe that the only theory with genuine merit, Darwin's theory of evolution, is the only one that should be taught to children in Science lessons - where religion has no place.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "ban the teaching of religion in school science lessons."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19153
